I wish I could get a lucky bag!!!
I have nothing more to say~

Tell me your story~

The Watcher

I want to hear the story about the lucky fish!

Watcher

Oh my, you really came!
You're a person of your word,
So I'll let you in on another little secret.

This is the official explanation printed on merchant Ziya's flyers.
If you don't believe it, I have other interpretations to share.

There's no such thing as miracles,
The auspicious clouds were just a coincidence,
And that "mysterious force blocking us" was actually just <color=#8AAB4B>turbulence</color>.

At first, when the Fortune Treasure Box appeared,
everyone would rush to grab the lucky bags.
I had to explain for quite a while, but all the Fortune Fish were very generous about it.

After explaining for quite a while,
The <color=#8AAB4B>lucky fish</color> were all very generous,
Everyone who came got a share.

Let me tell you a secret: <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color> wasn't always called that.
Ziya changed their name to emphasize the meaning of "good fortune" and make it sound more sophisticated.
They were actually called <color=#8AAB4B>Yu Fu</color>.

You know, the kind of story that touches your heart and makes you think,
the kind that stays with you long after you've finished it,
and might even move you to tears.

From the very first day I stood here,
I never imagined
that a scarecrow like me would make so many new friends.

Remember I told you about the <color=#8AAB4B>Fu Yu</color> buddies?
Since we've gotten to know each other pretty well,
let me share a little secret with you.

Actually, I just stand here,
day and night,
so the fish won't feel lonely, that's all.

While <color=#8AAB4B>lucky fish</color> may just be a wishful dream,
the <color=#8AAB4B>lucky bags</color> are definitely real!
People come fishing here more because it's just plain fun.

Like, "Catching <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color> is so wild!"
Like, "Getting a <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Treasure Chest</color> is amazing!"
Like, "Grabbing <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bags</color> is so much fun!"

I've shared all the juicy gossip I know with you!
Next time you come to chat,
Let's talk about something else - it'll be just as exciting!

I only learned about this feature
after everyone started making wishes to me with their hands pressed together in prayer,
and Ziya finally told me what was going on.

Later I found out,
everyone was grabbing stuff,
just because "they saw others doing it and wanted to join in the fun."

The lake in <color=#8AAB4B>Hainlu</color> used to be
blocked by mysterious forces,
and had no flow, so while the water was crystal clear, there were no fish.

You know, the kind of story that touches your heart and makes you think,
stays with you long after you've finished it,
and moves you so much you can't help but cry.

Oh, right! If you have any wishes to make,
or anything you'd like to tell the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color>,
I'd be happy to pass them along - free of charge!

The <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bags</color> are up for grabs!
No need to fight - just be quick,
You've got a golden 10 minutes, or they'll be gone!

So,
what would you like to tell me?
I only learned about it after everyone told me with their hands pressed together in prayer.

Later, everyone made their wishes together,
When the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color> heard them,
it came soaring through the sky on auspicious clouds, trailing rays of golden light.

<color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Fish</color> isn't actually a single fish,
they're three buddies,
and you never know which one will show up for work each day.

Actually, I have another well-known function,
which is to convey your wishes to the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color>,
so you can receive a <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bag</color>.

You can get a <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bag</color> from the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Chest</color>,
just reach in and grab one!
There's enough for everyone, no need to fight over them.

But I'll still pass on your wish,
I guarantee it'll come true one hundred percent,
If you don't believe me, try opening a <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Box</color> in a bit.

When the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Box</color> appears,
everyone rushes towards it.
At first, I thought people were just competing to grab the lucky bags.

However, the quality of the <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bag</color> you get
is still up to chance,
Here's hoping you'll get <color=#8AAB4B>Golden Lucky Bags</color> every time!

Actually, I just stand here,
Day and night,
So the fish won't feel lonely, that's all.

I only realized after standing here for a long time,
that I could actually help protect the fishes' food.
Ever since I started standing here...

Hello, my hundred-th... oh no, I mean,
my most cherished friend to chat with,
Were you also drawn here by the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color> event?

Many people are curious about my story,
but even after thinking long and hard,
the person in charge of promoting fishing activities couldn't come up with a suitable tale.

I've been standing here since the <color=#8AAB4B>Auspicious Clouds</color> and <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Fish</color> appeared,
I figured they'd show me some respect,
though I only learned about this recently myself.

Later I found out,
everyone was grabbing stuff,
just because "they saw others doing it and wanted to join in the fun."

I've never seen a bird
perch on my shoulder.

Alright, if you ever want to chat,
feel free to come find me anytime,
I won't be lonely, and neither will my little fishy friends~

Many people are curious about my story,
but even after thinking long and hard,
the PR person in charge of fishing promotions couldn't come up with a suitable one.

Actually, I have a secret ability that not many know about.
I can convey your wishes to the <color=#8AAB4B>Fortune Fish</color>,
which increases your chances of catching a <color=#8AAB4B>Lucky Bag</color>.

I'm also quite curious,
How do they divide up their work?
Do they ever squabble over who gets more jobs?

I only realized after standing here for a long time,
that I could help protect the fish while they eat.
Ever since I started standing here...

I've never seen a single bird
perch upon my shoulder.

Ever since the <color=#8AAB4B>lucky fish</color> first came here,
I've been keeping them company.
So, would you like to hear their story, or mine?

brought the ocean's blessing—countless fish and their offspring,
and that's how,
the "Hain Festival" came to be!

Later on, somehow they kept making this "yu-fu yu-fu" sound,
everyone started calling them "Lucky Fish" instead,
and then Ziyan just sighed and started calling them Lucky Fish too, haha.
